sentences.sContent: It was considered impolitic of him to spend too much time with the party radicals.
sentences.sCn: 他花太多时间与党内的激进分子在一起，这被认为是不明智的。

remMethod.val: im(不) + politic(有手腕的， 有策略的) → 失策的

trans.tranOther: behaving in a way that is not careful and that could make people think you are not sensible
